articles.author: R.J. Anderson
articles.title: World Baseball Classic score: Japan holds off USA as Shohei Ohtani closes out team's third WBC championship - CBS Sports
articles.description: Team Japan beat Mike Trout and the Americans 3-2 Tuesday night in Miami
articles.content: Japan defeated Team USA 3-2 on Tuesday night to win the 2023 World Baseball Classic. Japan, who went undefeated throughout the tournament, has now won three WBC tournaments: 2006, 2009, and 2023. The… [+4681 chars]
